purpose: Enhance decision-making processes by leveraging language models to adapt plans based on feedback
principle: Utilizes language models to generate and adapt plans dynamically based on feedback, improving decision-making capabilities
reusability: Designed as a modular framework that can be integrated into various decision-making systems, with potential API support for customization
limitations: Primarily experimental, may require substantial domain-specific tuning and lacks real-time feedback integration
name: AdaPlanner
description: AdaPlanner: Language Models for Decision Making via Adaptive Planning from Feedback
highlight: Adaptive planning for decision making using feedback-driven language models
